Provides utility functions for developers. Currently these are the available features:

At Gitlab:
- Auto fill for Cross Testing based on test script

General:
- Option to store custom text (comma separated) to search test script. Example: "ðŸ“„, roteiro, script"
- Option to change and store background and text color
